table.searchString: sourcetype="MSWindows:2008R2:IIS" sc_win32_status=2148074254 | top s_ip |fields - percent | rename s_ip as "IP Address", count as Count
table.title: Top Failed Logons By IP Address

table.searchString: sourcetype="MSWindows:2008R2:IIS" | eval time=strftime(_time,"%d/%m/%Y %H:%M:%S") | stats latest(time) as "Last Access Time",count(cs_username) as "Count" by cs_username|rename cs_username as "User"
table.title: Credential Usage
